itemInfo.title: Alcohol
itemInfo.description: Too much alcohol wreaks havoc on your mood. According to the Royal College of Psychiatrists, alcohol can cause an imbalance in your brain chemistry, increasing the risk of depression. Whatâ€™s more, overindulging can cause social problems, resulting in isolation that can lead to depression. Lastly, hangovers themselves can create days of low mood and anxiety. Try to stick with a glass or two of wine a night.
